attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: {"prompt": "Generate telemetry model-driven configuration for Optics protocol on IOS XR. Server: 192.0.2.50, port: 10000, protocol: grpc no-tls, encoding: self-describing-gpb."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
"telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group OPTICS-PROTOCOL
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info/submarine-info
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-dwdm-carrier-channel-map
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-osa-controller-optics-oper:osa-controller-operational-info/osa-optics-controller
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-db-info
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 192.0.2.50
    port 10000
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription SUB-OPTICS-PROTOCOL
  sensor-group-id OPTICS-PROTOCOL sample-interval 30000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !"
